The following translations in EL need to be checked / re-translated, since they
had double (or even triple) entries for default. The translators saw this as eg
"Create preview Default: Preview"

'button_preview'
'label_action_plan'
'label_login'
'header_preview'
'risk_priority'
'label_image'
'label_problem_description'
'label_legal_reference'
'label_default_probability'
'label_survey_title'
'help_surveygroup_title'
